sentences.sentence: Immigrant workers were classed as aliens.
sentences.translation: 移民来的工人被归入侨民类。

sentences.sentence: Immigrant tales have always been popular themes in fiction.
sentences.translation: 移民故事一直是小说的流行主题。

sentences.sentence: Immigrant support groups are waiting to see if he sticks to his word.
sentences.translation: 支持移民的团体正观望他是否遵守诺言。
